item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: About
item.description: PhD Mathematical Genomics, University of Cambridge Research Assistant, Walter and Eliza Hall Institute MSc Probability and Statistics, University of Melbourne Optimisation Consultant, Biarri Commercial Mathematics BSc Applied Mathematics, University of Melbourne

item.title: Publications
item.description: Chou, Evelyn S, Sabia Z Abidi, Marian Teye, Aleksandra Leliwa-Sytek, Thomas S Rask, Simon A Cobbold, Gerry Q Tonkin-Hill, et al. 2017. “A High Parasite Density Environment Induces Transcriptional Changes and Cell Death in Plasmodium Falciparum Blood Stages.” FEBS J., December. doi:10.1111/febs.14370. Lees, John A, Gerry Tonkin-Hill, and Stephen D Bentley. 2017. “Stronger Together.” Nat. Rev. Microbiol., August. doi:10.1038/nrmicro.2017.95. Mitchell, Michela L, Brett R Hamilton, Bruno Madio, Rodrigo A V Morales, Gerry Q Tonkin-Hill, Anthony T Papenfuss, Anthony W Purcell, Glenn F King, Eivind A B Undheim, and Raymond S Norton.

item.title: Software
item.description: Starmie R package developed with Stuart Lee to make post processing of population structure software output easier. rhierBAPS R package implementing the hierBAPS algorithm. falciparum transcriptome scripts Scripts used in analysing Plasmodium falciparum transciptome data.
